original: 「東都洛陽已有二百餘年，氣數已盡。我看長安的氣勢正旺。我想奉天子前往長安，眾大臣等各自整備行李，一同前往！」
text: "The eastern capital of Luoyang has been over two hundred years, and the aura is exhausted. I think Chang'an is full of vigor. I want to go to Chang'an in the name of the emperor, and the ministers and others will prepare their luggage and go together!"
